body_html: This is still an issue, and it seems to be related to the way we handle references in TensorFlow when freezing. I haven't had time to investigate, but it's come up repeatedly so it seems worth keeping alive. I'm cc-ing Suharsh since he's looking at related areas around graph freezing.
